reporting_cycle: The Counter-Terrorism Committee (CTC) to report orally, through its Chairman, at least every 180 days to the Council
summary:
17. The Council encourages CTED to continue joint activities with the 1267 Monitoring Team, the 1540 Committee experts, and the United Nations Office on Drugs and Crime to assist Member States.
